author: Staff Reporter
text:
The District Mahila Court on Tuesday sentenced a youth to five years rigorous imprisonment as he was found guilty of raping a four-year-old girl.

The judge, G. Raja, slapped a fine of Rs. 2,000 too on him.

Additional Public Prosecutor R. Sarojini said that the girl was studying LKG and was at home for the half-yearly holidays when the incident took place on December 24, 2013. C. Arvindsamy (19), a construction worker and her neighbour, committed the crime when she asked him to help her take some photographs.

Arvind was arrested and released on bail.
title: RI for raping minor girl
